website_summaries.verdict: In two weeks, muscle groups tend to feel better while your skin will look more supple.
pros: A conscientious mix of ingredients that are Kosher and non-GMO provide more collagen and protein per serving than most brands
Hair and skin improvements will be noticed first
cons: Reviews suggest there may be differences among products, however customer service is responsive

customer_reviews.title: Container arrived HALF FULL
customer_reviews.text: I finally purchased this collagen powder because of all the rave reviews and couldn’t wait to start taking it. The container arrived half full!!! Is this a normal occurrence? For such a steep price I expected an actual full box. I read the description saying they leave some room for the scoop; my container can literally fit 10 more scoops in there. So disappointed since this will probably last only a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Alex H.

customer_reviews.title: Collagen
customer_reviews.text: It is practically tasteless, does not mix well in very cold water. It's not supposed to provide pain relief. I'm taking it on advise from my Naturopath because I recently started having PRP injections for Golfers elbow.
customer_reviews.author: chet zygmunt

customer_reviews.title: Burnt product!
customer_reviews.text: My container was burned on the inside and the powder tasted like smoke!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa bradley

customer_reviews.title: Container half full
customer_reviews.text: Container only comes half full. Costco has 24 oz for cheaper and the container if full.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Howard

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t dissolve
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is great, as it’s tasteless. However, the powder doesn’t dissolve. It is impossible to drink this.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Hoping it was a bad batch
customer_reviews.text: I’m thinking I received a bad batch of vital proteins that must have opened in transit. The box was covered in the powder and there was clumps in it upon opening. It almost looked burned
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Got a bad batch
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this product from the same seller for awhile. Just received another today and it was sealed like normal but the powder immediately looked off to me. It was a light yellow/off white color and was much more course then the normal fine powder!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Bugs or something in my powder.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what's in my powder but it's not normal and tastes horrible. This isn't my first time buying either. Been using this product for over a year. It has me all "bugged" out. Bleh
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My skin looks so much more plumped and fine lines GONE
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this after I used a full tub of another popular brand. I didn't see much difference in my skin with that one. This one...holy cow! My skin looks so much more plumped and fine lines GONE. A little about me. I am 43, and do take care of my skin, but my skin had started to slightly sag. It doesn't look like that now. Another bonus is I don't hear all the snap, crackle and popping when I get out of bed. My hair and nails grow like crazy!! This is a fabulous product! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It friggin works for hair growth!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well, it has been 3 weeks and I have noticed eyelash growth, 3/4 of an inch of hair growth and improvement in joint pain just a little...maybe that part is in my head...I took pics. I read reviews from people saying they gained weight. I didn't. I put this in hot liquid. It's the only way to drink it in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Elizabeth Getman

customer_reviews.title: First I love his product
customer_reviews.text: First I love his product. My hair is thicker shinier and healthier. I've also seen a lot of improvements in my recovery after strenuous workouts. However, I just received another bottle and when I opened the cap there was a small black curly hair inside. Gross!! Would love to hear back from vital Proteins and get a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Do your skin and hair a favor and take this ...
customer_reviews.text: Do your skin and hair a favor and take this twice today you will not believe the results!!!! I'm a believer
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Mcnamara

customer_reviews.title: Manually select Vital Proteins as the seller
customer_reviews.text: After reading several reviews that talk about this product being inconsistent, I made sure to go down to the seller option (the one that takes you to the list of sellers and prices for the product) and selected Vital Proteins as the seller. They do sell directly from the manufacturer here on Amazon. The tub I received was great. Fine, white powder with little to no taste and it dissolved easily in water. I think if you auto fill your order you can’t control who you get it from which is why it’s inconsistent.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: WHAT did I just receive?!!! (from a regular vital proteins consumer) EWWW!!! EW EW
customer_reviews.text: I never write amazon reviews. I am very disturbed. I just received a CLEARLY previously opened tub of collagen-- the foil on top came like that, it was clearly attempted to glue back on, and there is black stuff inside!!! EW EW EW EW!!! I usually buy vital proteins all the time (have been a customer for years) and this is clearly unacceptable because it's been hampered with. I usually love it as a 10/10 product... but NOT this time. I am disgusted. This is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: kelsey

customer_reviews.title: I tried this today, 1/2 scoop with 4 oz ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried this today, 1/2 scoop with 4 oz of bone broth. Within 1/2 hour, I felt itchy all over, especially face and hands, and elevated heart rate. I took Benadryl and went to urgent care. I'm concerned about having a secondary reaction within 12 - 24 hours. Has anyone had an allergic reaction, and how long did it last ? Thanks
customer_reviews.author: beverly wolf

customer_reviews.title: ... Vital Proteins multiple times on Amazon and have been pleased. Vital Proteins is the highest quality collagen peptides ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered Vital Proteins multiple times on Amazon and have been pleased. Vital Proteins is the highest quality collagen peptides you can buy. But, I’ve now gotten a bad batch twice. Instead of the fine, white powder I’m used to seeing, this was more coarse yellowish/beige powder that had a horribly bitter taste in coffee. Usually, I don’t notice any taste whatsoever. I’ve never had this issue when ordering directly from the Vital Proteins website, so I guess I’ll be doing that from now on. Very disappointed to have wasted money on a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Kara R.

customer_reviews.title: they added GMO - Synthetic Vitamin C  (Ascorbic acid ) !!!! WHY???
customer_reviews.text: they added GMO sourced - Synthetic Vitamin C (Ascorbic acid ) WHY ??? it was a perfect 1 ingredient collagen , now its garbage to me , if you dont want glyphosphates (Roundup) in your body ... scientifically proven in court to cause cancer !!! what the crap , why go paleo just to poison your body ,... not to mention ascorbic acid in long term can cause problems with health .... come on vital proteins ....
customer_reviews.author: A.R. Shearer

customer_reviews.title: After two weeks the results were amazing. I work with my hands and was told ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to try to help inflammation and joint pain. After two weeks the results were amazing. I work with my hands and was told that I needed to quit or at least slow down. Even the doctor is amazed at the improvement. I no longer take anti inflammatory prescription medication and all my joints have benefitted.
customer_reviews.author: Anne E. Blanton

customer_reviews.title: Collagen Peptides Benefits and Product Compairson
customer_reviews.text: What have you heard about Collagen Peptides? This video product Comparison answers your questions about skin tone, look and feel, joint pain and other benefits plus compares to top rated brands.
customer_reviews.author: ByPennyMorgan

customer_reviews.title: L.O.V.E it!
customer_reviews.text: Husband: "you've been looking really pretty lately (what was I looking like before LOL?!). Your skin is glowing." 2 weeks of this collagen, 2 scoops mixed in coffee or tea. Skin appears more firm and even toned. I'm fastidious about skin care, incorporating a 10 step Korean routine. By the way, I'm 65 and still receive compliments. Not going down without a fight :)
customer_reviews.author: MO

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. . . . Buy at Costco for $29.00
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. . . . Why not buy at Costco for $29.00? ? ? ?
customer_reviews.author: Carpet Guy

customer_reviews.title: Makes skin younger and more bouncy
customer_reviews.text: I have been using collagen powder now for 6 months, used a different brand and same results but more headache to get it to dissolve than this brand. I'm 30 and was told by a 22 year old (gasp), that it would help my skin. Much to my surprise IT DID. My skin is tighter and bouncier. I realize that 30 is young but I do see changes in my skin from aging and this collagen helped make it more supple in about 1 week. I take one scoop every morning and mix it with amino acid powder on an empty stomach. 6 months later and I still buy it and use it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin-SanDiego

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent product
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 10 ounce and the product was fine. It has an after taste, but was tolerable. I ran out quickly doing 3 scoops a day. Once I ran out, I switched to the 20 ounce. It tasted and smelled off when I drank the first night. The second night I barely finished it without gagging. The third night, I drank two sips and initiated the return. It smells and tasted rancid and not like the first container I purchased. It’s bothersome that there are so many similar complaints which makes me wonder if I should switch brands or stop ordering from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Horrible abdominal pain after years of use.
customer_reviews.text: After taking this for a couple years I nearly ended in the hospital with abdominal pain. They did something to the original formula and I’ll never take it again. I now use a simple whey protein powder with nothing else in it. I get it at Natural Grocers. It comes in a bag. It has high protein content and relatively low calories. No gut issues.
customer_reviews.author: Gracewriter

customer_reviews.title: BAD BATCH!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT ORDER FROM AMAZON! I switched my subscription to coming straight from Vital Proteins. I'd previously purchased at a grocery store and loved the product. My first container from Amazon was noticeably different. It was not powder-like, had a gritty texture and had a terrible taste. I am returning this to Amazon and ordering straight from the mfgr from now on.
customer_reviews.author: zee915

customer_reviews.title: Listen to what everyone else is saying - don't buy from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE. Like many other reviewers, I also received a bad batch. The powder is an off-white color, has a weird odor, and doesn't dissolve in any liquid. I tried hot water, cold water, juice, and a smoothie, and nothing worked. It just clumps up and tastes foul. Buy from the Vital Proteins site or another authorized retailer, but stay away from the Amazon product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Mahler

customer_reviews.title: Extreme Gastro Distress With Product
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try this product during my January whole 30 to supplement my hair growth. I did not take it during the first few days of my whole 30 and was fine. Once I started taking this supplement I had extreme diarrhea every day. I stopped taking it and my BM’s returned to somewhat normal. Beware if you start having issues, you may be sensitive to this product. Will not use again.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Novak

customer_reviews.title: Multiple hormone-related reactions
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this for joint support. Can’t say I’ve had any noticeable difference in joints, hair, skin, or nails. It does, however, seem to have had a negative effect on my hormone levels. I started breaking out. I was in this horrible unshakable temperament every day that I took it for no apparent reason- very out of character for me. My poor husband was just dumbfounded. It also had a minor but frustrating side effect “in bed”. (I started having an extremely hard time “getting there”). Stopped taking yesterday. Hoping everything goes back to normal soon. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT mix well with either hot or cold, nasty smell and leaves chunks
customer_reviews.text: I opened the package and immediately smelled similar to dog pee. YUCK! I also decided to give it a shot and mixed it with my hot coffee - it left HUGE gel like clumps - and it had a nasty flavor to it, so much so that I couldn’t finish my coffee. So for my final attempt to tried to add it to cold water and found that it DOESN’T blend or mix well, it leaves particle chunks. I smelled the water and it definitely smelled like the powder (dog pee) I even gagged. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mets

customer_reviews.title: Living the proof it works! ♥️
customer_reviews.text: As I have been approaching getting older my nails, skin and joints and suffered. I heard good things about collagen and this particular product. I read some Amazon reviews and they were very mixed. I decided to try and review for myself. I ordered the smallest size. As you can see in the enclosed photo my nails were brittle and chipped...2nd photo was taken 2 weeks later after taking this product. Such a wonderful difference! Skin, nails look so healthy! I feel better! I immediately ordered the larger size and look forward to continued progress. I put 1 scoop in my morning cup of coffee. 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: charli

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience
customer_reviews.text: I had great expectations for this product and wanted to love it but first day into taking it,I noticed two bumbs on my chin,second day it became three,and by the third day,I had about 6 horrible bumps on my chin.
customer_reviews.author: Innocent

customer_reviews.title: Smells and tastes a little beefier than other brands
customer_reviews.text: This is priced much higher than competitors and it's hard to tell if it's any more effective than the others. It definitely has a much more beefy smell and taste than the other brands I've tried, which makes it harder to get down. Add to that the fact that it dissolves best in warmer water and it's a bit of a chore to work myself up to taking it. However, I love what collagen does for my skin. Everyone is different, but for me, I'm not convinced it's worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: AmericanJan

customer_reviews.title: Good product but check costco first
customer_reviews.text: It dissolves quickly in hot water/coffee/ tea with little taste but a slightly unpleasant smell. I like the product but found it in twice the size for $4 more at Costco so I'm returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kona coast

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from amazon! Otherwise a good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought my third container of this on amazon, the previous two I had received we’re a much finer consistency and the packaging matches what was shown in the picture. The one I have now is a chunkier consistency and almost more yellow? There has to be something wrong with their inventory. The previous product is actually pretty good. Doesn’t help with my nails, but seems to be thickening my hair. I put two scoops in my coffee in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Product contaminated
customer_reviews.text: Please beware: I received this yesterday, when I went to open it the band was secure, however the sealed foil top was open a little. This is what was inside, black (almost looks like pepper) mixed with the powder. I’ve never used this before and wasn’t sure if it came that way. Because I was leery, I went to target and bought a fresh container. The second picture shows how the product should look. I’m very disappointed and a bit disgusted. Please make sure your product is not contaminated.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Breakouts?!
customer_reviews.text: Used to love this product but some things changed. Everytime I take it now , I breakout! Never had this problem in the past with this brand...and I just missed the window to return it because I kept trying every week. Ughhh! Did I get a bad batch or did the formula change?
customer_reviews.author: GreenEyedCaliGirl

customer_reviews.title: Oops????  Allergies..fish and tree nuts suprise.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I have taken this product for years, and when we started the jars were not labeled "made in a facility that processes ......fish and tree nuts". The white and blue colored caps designated different types of this collagen. We understand that in the past products did not have to be labeled for allergy sufferers. Has this product always been processed this way? Who knows, but I now have a grandchild that IS allergic to these things, and we didn't realize the label had changed. Surprise! Just goes to show you, keep checking those labels, even on products that you thought were formerly safe. Be ever vigilant. Have always loved this product, but must find another source now.
customer_reviews.author: LMB

customer_reviews.title: Something is off with this newer batch...definitely NOT tasteless like before and smells!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a lot of other reviewers/responses mentioned a new formulation being more granular. I noticed this, but it seemed to mix in no problem, so that has been fine. However, with this recent batch, the taste and smell has been overwhelming, which I did not experience with Vital Proteins in the past. This is meant to be nearly flavorless and I could mix it in with my coffee or tea and barely notice it. Now when I have my coffee or tea, it stinks of this stuff and the taste is pretty horrible. I enjoyed Vital Proteins up to this point and I would hate to have to switch. What happened, Vital Proteins?
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Good pure product
customer_reviews.text: This says 'flavorless' but I can taste it and am...er...getting use to it BUT on the upside it is helping me get rid of crepey skin after a big weight loss and I'm noticing my hair is getting thicker. I've done repeat orders. Good pure product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wales

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t ever write reviews but after using my second tub of this, I am seriously obsessed! My nails grow so fast it’s hard to keep up, they’re also much stronger feeling. My eyelashes are much fuller and longer. I stopped using this for about a month when I finished my first tub and could definitely tell that my lashes went back to being thinner. Two weeks into using my second tub, they were back to extra full and long. I’m 23 so I didn’t notice a huge difference in my skin, but it doesn’t feel more supple. Lastly, my hair is growing so fast! Highly recommend this product :)
customer_reviews.author: Steve Falk

customer_reviews.title: Avid user
customer_reviews.text: My daughter first turned me onto this product. I had recent facial surgery and had a section of my scalp shaved due to a need for skin grafting. I used this product daily and I can honestly say that it has jump started my new hair growth and my nails are amazing. I am a runner and my discomfort with joints is gone. I have spread the word and several of my friends have started using this product and are loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nasty Smell from Amazon but not store
customer_reviews.text: Nasty smell! When I opened the container I was hit with a rancid, flatulent smell! Decided to try it in my tea as usual and it also tasted nasty just like the smell! When I purchase from store it has no smell, and doesn’t change the taste of my tea at all, and my store container expires YEARS after the one I was sent through this Amazon purchase. I called vita proteins customer service and was told it shouldn’t have a smell. Contacted seller to try to exchange but I was only given a refund. Just purchase from the store. Amazon must get the old bad ones I’m guessing 🤷🏽‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: s s

customer_reviews.title: ... because I heard it would help with wrinkles and fine lines. A friend of mine had done a ...
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this product because I heard it would help with wrinkles and fine lines. A friend of mine had done a lot of research and recommended this product. With in 5 days I noticed a significant decrease in my back pain that has been continuous since an accident a few years back. Now it’s been 3 weeks and my skin feels and looks more fresh and young but the biggest win is my back keeps feeling better each day. I have also referred to my father who is seeing the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Jul

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper at Costco
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a friend. She is78 and loves what this product is doing for her skin. It is overpriced and will not last 30 days. Buy from Costco. Cheaper and get 4 more ounces,
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia S Davis

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic amount of powder
customer_reviews.text: I contacted the seller about the amount of powder , in the container. They said this was due to settling and air. There was only about 3 inches of powder , in the bottom. My Daughter just came from Albany to visit, she is a personnel Trainer who told us about the powder, for our joints. She brought her container in and showed us the amount, its almost 3/4 full and she has taken about 4 scoops out. She buys her powder from GNC , and says there is no way this is the correct amount! I will be buying my powder from GNC.
customer_reviews.author: david fuller

customer_reviews.title: Amazing help for osteoarthritis pain in knees
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking this daily for more than a year. It has helped knee and shoulder pain associated with osteoarthritis. Initially, it took 6 weeks to take effect. I’ve stopped it twice for 2 weeks when on vacation, and sore knees returned. It also helps my hair grow, amazing the lady who cuts my hair. I recommend it highly. I put 2 scoops in with my morning coffee or in a yogurt fruit breakfast smoothie. Made a huge difference. I’m hiking in the mountains again—and skiing in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: So Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the product for a month, which I realize isn't enough time to rate its efficacy, but I already see a difference in my nails. The ridges have already become much less noticeable. My hairdresser recommended them as she has seen dramatic improvements from clients that use this product so here's hoping!
customer_reviews.author: JRB

customer_reviews.title: Really do recommend this product for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: I love this collagen powder. I mix it in my coffee in the morning. Doesn’t alter the taste or smell or consistency of my coffee. I love that. I’ve been using this one for over a year now and I’ve noticed my hair grows faster and thicker, nails are finally not breaking? That’s huge for me. And my skin looks great. I live in Florida and I do think I don’t have age spots or sun sports because I’m consistent with this collagen powder. My knees used to pop all the time with every squat and I do see improvement there, and ease to do squats. I feel that my knees are oiled 😊
customer_reviews.author: Olga S

customer_reviews.title: Great for hair and nails
customer_reviews.text: Mainly got it for my hair as I was having some terrible issues. I do 2 scoops a day once in morning in coffee, once at dinner with chai tea. Way better with coffee. My hair is coming in thicker for sure. My nails (which have NEVER been the issue) are growing faster...too fast! But you have to sometimes take the good with the bad. Must be consistent though, and basically I figure I'll be taking this stuff forever.
customer_reviews.author: Chicken Pot Pie

customer_reviews.title: It really seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for my skin. As I am getting older my skin seems to be getting thinner. This product was recommended to me. Have been taking it for several months and my massage therapist says she can tell a difference. Absolutely no taste when mixed in my black coffee in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Mary McNeice

customer_reviews.title: Usually ok
customer_reviews.text: Maybe something has changed, or I got a bad batch. I have used this product continuously for the past few years. The canister I got in December wasn’t as powder fine as it had been. Ok, not a big deal. The canister I got in April has a horribly smell! Plastic? I don’t know. Awful!! And I don’t feel like my hair and nails are responding like they used to. Hopefully the smelly one was just a bad batch. It was ridiculously strong. I used to love this, hoping I will again soon!
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Formulation has changed and will not dissolve
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing this monthly for years but there was a change in the formulation about 6 months ago. it is not as fine and simply will not dissolve.I've tried making it into a paste as you would in cooking and then adding water but it still remains clumpy.I'm going to try a suggestion to mix it with hot water But I have canceled my subscription and will look for something finer.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hurlburt

customer_reviews.title: This Collagen is a Miracle-worker! A must buy! You will not regret purchasing it!
customer_reviews.text: This Collagen powder is incredible! It is the second brand I've decided to try, and it is now by far, my favorite! I've been ingesting it for about 4-6 months now.. And it's made a huge difference in my quality of life. I am recently recovering from an illness and have had a couple of health scares before my diagnoses.. Since I started taking Collagen peptides, I have noticed a faster recovery, my muscle tone is no longer atrophied but now more defined and stronger, I feel fantastic and healthier than I ever have. I cannot go one day without it! This Collagen powder is Heaven-sent! Thank you Vital Proteins! 🙏🏻
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Fox

customer_reviews.title: Helped with my cystic acne
customer_reviews.text: I developed really bad cystic acne after getting off birth control and within a couple months I was pregnant which left me with almost no options for medications or procedures I could do to help the problem. For months I dealt with increasingly worse acne and scarring until I came across articles on how collagen has helped some folks with cystic acne. My OB doctor cleared me to take this supplement while pregnant, and within a couple days I started noticing a difference! New breakouts had subsided and my face is finally healing! I’ve been taking Vital Proteins for 2 weeks now and the progress has continued.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There’s something wrong
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this product on Amazon and Costco. The product should be the same, but it’s not. The one I buy from Costco dissolves super easy in hot and ok in cold. This one, ok in hot and not at all in cold. I don’t understand why it’s different. Not gonna buy again from here. I like to take collagen because it helped during my second pregnancy with my skin and I’m hoping it helps for the PP hair loss soon. Since I’m breastfeeding, I’m being super picky with what I take and I just don’t trust it. Theres just something about it. Idk if the products is old, a different manufacturer, idk something.
customer_reviews.author: ana amaro

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a year now and alternate between picking it up at a local natural foods store and ordering it here. Unfortunately, the canister I received was spoiled or unauthentic. The powder is supposed to be white, odorless, and fine ground. What I received was yellowing, grainy, and had a rancid smell, kind of like dried old milk despite the expiration date being pretty far into the future. I contacted Amazon, and they let me return the defective item for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Let's Keep It Real

customer_reviews.title: I've purchased this several times. I mix with my ...
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this several times. I mix with my coffee every morning. This most recent batch does not mix well. There is something slightly off about it.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Badger

customer_reviews.title: Definitely see positive changes!
customer_reviews.text: Been taking this for over 2 months and I definitely notice a change in my joints and a glow in my complexion. I’ve been watching my diet lately - more fruits and vegetables, more water, less sugars, etc, so I’m not sure if that’s making me feel better or if it’s the collagen. I typically do eat healthy and know my body and how it reacts to diet. I’m feeling more changes than normal so I really do think the collagen is making a difference!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: No taste protein powder
customer_reviews.text: After my doctor suggested I start using protein powder I started the hunt for one that wouldn't make me gag. Seriously I tried so many where the taste was more than I could tolerate. A friend was using Vital Proteins Collagen Peptides Powder and suggested I try hers before purchasing. Well, I was pleasantly surprised when I added it to my coffee and tasted nothing but coffee. I now use it in hot and cold drinks, and oatmeal, etc. I have even added it to mashed potatoes without changing the taste or texture. I am sold on this product and will continue using it.
customer_reviews.author: jacr

customer_reviews.title: Formula Change?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what's going on. My first order last month dissolved wonderfully! This months packaging looked different and it does not dissolve as smoothly as before. Wondering if this is the real stuff or not?
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: I love it and tell everyone I know to use it
customer_reviews.text: I love it and tell everyone I know to use it! I take it in my morning coffee or evening tea and can not even tell it’s there. The only time I tasted it is when I used a stainless steel coffee cup. I’m a 28 year old women who has always had a sketchy hair line (especially after pregnancy), just wasn’t full looking for some reason, maybe due to my fine hair. I’ve been using this for about 8 months and I’ve now got a full looking hair line!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highest Quality and Value
customer_reviews.text: I have tried more than several different brands of collagen protein. This is by far the best product and the best value. It dissolves completely and has no taste and it's so versatile! I am never without it and use it every morning in my coffee along with MCT oil. I was starting to have a few aches and pains in joints and within a month of using this, it was all gone. I highly recommend Vital Proteins !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mixed into my tea
customer_reviews.text: I drink a cup of chai tea with this mixed in every morning. I don't even notice it is in there, which is great. I am pregnant and have continued drinking this throughout my pregnancy (cut back to one scoop per day instead of two). I know they say stretch marks can't be prevented but I am nearing the end and VERY prone to stretch marks, and so far I haven't gotten any....could be coincidence but I think maybe this has helped my skin maintain elasticity!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Purchase - NOT Authentic
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Vital Proteins for a year. I know how it smells, reacts in hot water, cold water, etc. THIS is NOT the real deal. It did not dissolve in boiling water (bad sign right there) but instead turned into a hard ball (of the mixture) that floated on top of my coffee. Very odd. It had a different scent. It was not the same consistency as the REAL Vital Proteins product (which I am very familiar with). I am worried about those who have consumed this fake product for possible health issues. I did not consume based on the initial discrepancies and am grateful for that. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: I must say my joints dont hurt like they used to - much better than anything else ...
customer_reviews.text: I must say my joints dont hurt like they used to - much better than anything else I have tried and I have tried it all even perscription medicine and nothing came even close to the joint relief I get from this - I didnt expect it
customer_reviews.author: kbc

customer_reviews.title: Buy at costco!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy!!! I have been ordering this from amazon, for months now. But lateley I noticed the amount of powder in the can was half filled. It does not mix well and stays clumped. I think the product they sell at Amazon are the refected ones. Costco has a 24 OZ. container that is full to the brim and is inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Kbar83

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: My mom is in her 50s and has been using Vital Proteins for over a year now. The powder easily dissolves into any liquid and is tasteless (she puts in her morning coffee). She originally purchased this product seeking help for her joints and stated within a month she started noticing results. Besides helping with her joints she feels that the product has also helped with her skin, hair, and nails. The downside she joked is her nails are growing faster now so she’s has to get a pedicure more often! She did state that during her use she tried switching to a cheaper product, only to notice the difference in results and quickly went back to using Vital Proteins.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: This is not the same product
customer_reviews.text: This product had something mixed in and was not pure. Texture and color different than real product. It did not blend and color was mixed with something brown in color. I went and bought vital protein at the store and there were no brown specs and the product mixed well in my coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Something has changed
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product but recently there has been a change. I receive this item monthly and the last 3 months the container has not been full nor is dissolving when added to hot liquids. I’m not sure what happened but I have no issues with the product before or when I get it elsewhere. Unless something changes I will be canceling all future orders and getting it at Target.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Bottle not even full.
customer_reviews.text: Opened my new bottle today and disappointed to see that the bottle is not even filled to the top. We measured the weight of the powder out of the bottle and it measured at 0.9 lb. We are suppose to get 1.25lb of product assuming minus the bottle weight. A total measurement of 0.9 lb product weight is unacceptable. We've bought this from Costco and had a full bottle filled to the top. This bottle was filled less and it was so obvious to untrained eyes. Amazon and Vital proteins you guys should not cheat your loyal customers with rudimentsry quality control sop.
customer_reviews.author: JayS

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch
customer_reviews.text: Something is wrong with this batch. I normally buy this directly from the store and have been impressed with this product (nearly odorless, tasteless, super easy to mix with my coffee in the morning). But this batch through Amazon has gone bad (perhaps gotten too hot?). My container has an expiration date, a batch code, had a safety seal when I opened it, and appears legitimate. However, it smells strongly of the collagen, tastes horrid, and looks a bit clumpy.
customer_reviews.author: CarmenAustin

customer_reviews.title: Love this ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Using for endometriosis amongst other things, was hesitant but this is completely untraceable in warm beverages. Not as much in cold unless it's a smoothie. No chalky gritty crud thankfully. Have had a noticable difference in an energy boost and hunger pangs have decreased entirely leading me to making better eating choices. Digestion is also improving. Haven't yet noticed any skin or hair benefits, but this is a few weeks in and with the other benefits it's given, I have high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: T. C

customer_reviews.title: Med experts say it's great for bone health, and much more
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try this for the nutritional benefits. It dissolves in warm drinks with no flavor or issues. It increases my protein intake and I will continue to use it for the foreseeable future. I really love the idea of this aiding in my bone health. Skin and hair health is a bonus. Should be another few weeks of daily use to see a physical benefit, if I can. Otherwise I have faith it's aiding in bone and joint health which is very important to me and my health in the future. Medical articles said they have proven that it increases bone density.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it used to be
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Vital Proteins for over a year. Their formula is different. It does not blend well in my coffee any longer and ends up clumping. You can also taste it. It collects at the bottom of my cup unless I continue to stir it before I finish my coffee. I will no longer subscribe to this item unfortunately. The make up has definitely changed since Nestle acquired the company. Cheaper ingredients!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie Cerabona

customer_reviews.title: Tub half empty
customer_reviews.text: Just opened a brand new 20oz tub and it’s half empty. I just finished a 10 oz tub so I poured it in to see how much I’m actually getting. I got one full 10 oz tub with just a little over left from the 20 oz tub. I feel ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Pebble

customer_reviews.title: Serious Game Charger!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! Collagen Peptides have me hooked! I have seen such a difference in my hair and nails since using this product (along with added gut benefits). The ingredients are simple. The extra protein without a flavor is great. They truly can be added to anything without taste or texture. I mix these in smoothies or sprinkle on about anything I am eating. Differently recommend these to everybody!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Just changed their formula to include synthetic vitamin C :(
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for a while, loved it. Now, recently, they just added synthetic vitamin c (Ascorbic acid) . Ascorbic acid has been shown to actually deplete your body of real vitamin c. I've seen people take ascorbic acid and then experience bleeding gums (a sympton of vitamin C deficiency). Get your vitamins from fruits and vegetables and let collagen be collagen. Sad they ruined this. Back to buying BulletProof.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Marlowe

customer_reviews.title: LOOK & FEEL AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS PROTEIN!! I’m not much of a breakfast person and wanted to start my day a little healthier. I add a scoop (10g of protein) to my coffee and it leaves me feeling fuller linger and overall just better! You can use up to 2 scoops per day but I find that one scoop works well for me. It doesn’t have any weird taste or chnage the texture of my drink in any way (I add almond milk to my coffee as well). My SKIN LOOKS AMAZING!! I notice when I started drinking this that my skin looks more supple, is glowing and overall texture is smoother!! I think it’s a win-win between looking good and feeling good!!
customer_reviews.author: styling mom

customer_reviews.title: Adverse reaction
customer_reviews.text: I do not have any allergies but this powder made me end up at my primary care physicians office and an ophthalmologist because it caused severe eye twitching. There is no listed side effect as eye twitching but as soon as I stopped taking it I was fine. My physician could not find anything medically wrong and the ophthalmologist said my vision was fine. This may just be something that happened to me but do not recommend this product. I am female and almost 50 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Brian jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Will let you know more after a few weeks! Update!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this and have for 3 days so far! It has NO taste and I am hoping it helps with hair, skin, and joints! I will repost a review when I have more information. After using one and a half tubs of the collagen powder, I notice my nails are much longer and harder, my skin is a bit clearer, and my hair is a bit healthier! I believe it's working, so I will keep using this product for another tub and a half and give another update.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not a difference after 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Really cannot tell a difference after 6 weeks of 1 scoop a day. Will keep taking a while longer. No taste when added to hot coffee. Will update if any progress before canister is empty. Agree with others that canister was only 2/3 full to begin with. May go back to Neocell tabs.
customer_reviews.author: CPA

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an avid runner and want to protect my joints from all of the pavement pounding I subject my legs to. It also helps tremendously with my hair, skin and nails, which need help due to my Hashimoto's thyroid disease. I also eat a Paleo diet and this fits in very well. There is no flavor at all to this and I've even used it in water with limes and cannot taste it. It blends very well in hot and cold drinks. I highly recommend this product. Great quality and reasonable price. I have it on Subscribe and Save and get one canister every month. You can even skip a month if you need to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Knee pain gone
customer_reviews.text: After months of knee pain, severe and limiting, I added this collagen and other supplements. I am happy to report that I will not return for any shots in the knee but prefer this more organic approach to cartilage loss. It has no taste, which is extremely important to me, it blends with any liquid without changing its taste. I mix it with my water and multivitamin ensuring I increase my water intake, get plenty of vitamins and the collagen as a bonus. This product was recommended to me by a trusted colleague and I will continue to take this on a daily basis. Great product and typically less on Amazon than at other health stores.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Strengthens hair and nails
customer_reviews.text: Vital proteins has helped my body to replenish protein and Amino Acids. Have Acid Reflux so taking Omeprazole can deplete vitamins and nutrients in your body. I like to pour coconut milk in an electric frother, add 2-scoops of powder and splash of raw honey. Has done wonders by strengthening hair; nails have gotten harder and longer. Vital Proteins has been a life saver. Helped restore vitamin D levels too.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Missing the hyaluronic acid and vitamin C
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing this product since last November and when I switched to the one containing the hyaluronic acid and vitamin C within a month I saw even better results. My husband even commented how thick my hair was beginning to look. My last two orders from Amazon was the product without the hyaluronic acid and vitamin C and due to COVID getting in touch with Amazon was too difficult to bother with. Now after two months I find my hair is shedding more than usual and I want to know how I can be sure to get the product I want with the hyaluronic acid and vitamin C. I believe that was the boost my hair needed.
customer_reviews.author: Gail E. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: IT Works if you take it daily
customer_reviews.text: I put one scoop in my coffee every morning. After six months of daily use, i there are very visible results: Both of my thumbnails had been growing out with heavy horizontal grooves for years. Now I have smooth normal thumbnails. Also the skin on my arms has started to grow papery with age and sun and that too has diminished notably. I also like that i get a good dose of amino acids from it though can't claim to feel a difference mentally or otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I've been using it religiously for about 3 months every morning blended up in my smoothies. I've notice my skin is tighter, my hair is softer and my nails are stronger. This isn't a product that will instantly cure your issues, it takes about 30-60 days to start seeing results and I use it in conjunction with a healthy diet and regular exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Houston

customer_reviews.title: Worth trying
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after a friend suggested I try it for osteoarthritis in my knee. I do think it is helping. I figured it couldn't hurt for all of my joints. Eight weeks in, I am having almost no knee pain!! It had gotten pretty bad, so I am excited! It has absolutely no flavor or smell, so you don't notice that you're drinking it even in a glass of water. I put one scoop in my morning smoothie and mix one into water in the evening. I think the only side effects are less appetite and some gassiness. This seems to be a good brand and a trustworthy product. Beware, it is not for vegans or vegetarians.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: This product was brand new, packaged well, and worked exactly as described. Seller did a good job explaining the product and the price point was competitive. If/when in the market, I will buy from this seller again. There is NO TASTE whatsoever. I mixed it in orange juice each morning. I could definitely tell a difference in the joints. It does take about a week, however, to really start seeing the benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Tari

customer_reviews.title: Tasteless and odorless!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t believe my friend when she told me that you could not tell a difference when you added this to coffee-or anything. I didn’t believe it. It is true! I started using this in my coffee about a month ago. Then i got sick. I didn’t drink coffee with collagen for four days. When I felt better and started back on my coffee-collagen regimen, I could tell a difference in my energy level! This works!
customer_reviews.author: Lagabbi111

customer_reviews.title: I originally got this to supplement my 4 yo daughter's ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this to supplement my 4 yo daughter's protein intake, as she will not eat meat. Based on other very recent customer reviews, and also the mentioning of probably heavy metal contamination via sources such as clean label project, I will not be purchasing this again. Do your research.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria D

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. My hair feels healthier and grows so much faster. My nails grow about 1/4 of an inch per week. I haven't experienced any of the negative items that are in other reviews, but everyone reacts differently. One negative thing that is probably more an Amazon issue than the product...I received an OPEN container with almost 1/2 of the contents missing. The protective seal was obviously broken. I was pretty skeeved out by that but Amazon's customer service was wonderful and all I had to do was send back the open item and they're sending me a new one!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey B

customer_reviews.title: Drop their “protein” powder
customer_reviews.text: I now use this instead my old protein powder. I am on my third bottle now, and although I cannot claim that this product healed my joint pain and aches completely, subjectively I feel it allowed me to build up my exercise tolerance with continued use. I also subjectively noticed my skin looks healthier and hair is thicker, but maybe it’s because I am exercising more, happier, and more content with me healthier lifestyle
customer_reviews.author: Den

customer_reviews.title: By far the best collagen powder I've used.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different brands of collagen powder (including this one multiple times) and I just keep coming back. Nothing dissolves with zero clumps like this brand. I LOVE using this in my coffee every morning. It is tasteless and completely dissolves without any stirring. My hair, skin, joints and even my nails seem much healthier when I take this powder consistently. I'm a lifer.
customer_reviews.author: kshaw

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this brand of collagen peptides for over a year or more, and one of the reasons I liked it was because it didn’t have any additional ingredients other than hydrolyzed bovine peptides. I was just about to reorder and noticed that it now contains Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid. I don’t want that. Unfortunately I’ll be looking for another brand now. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: MendelMom

customer_reviews.title: and really like it. I put it in my coffee
customer_reviews.text: Recent order - quality is different. I've been buying this brand of collagen peptides for a while now, and really like it. I put it in my coffee. However, there's something different about the recent batch that I received. I was told to put it into the coffee and let it sink in, then stir. And it's worked perfectly. But with this batch, it just clumps up and floats at the top. It's never done this before. I'm not sure what this means, but I hope they haven't started sacrificing quality for quantity. Having second thoughts about continuing with this brand now.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Z

customer_reviews.title: Sell- out
customer_reviews.text: So I read they were bought out by Nestle’s. Why do companies sell out? The product is never the same.
customer_reviews.author: Renie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased this product as I was beginning the Keto diet and they recommended. I'm in my early 60s and have my aches and pains - nothing major. I was not expecting much but I was very wrong. My joints feel better, I'm less achy, most of my restless leg syndrome is gone and I feel my muscles are more defined though that may be due to the weight loss and all the fat laying around has lessened so the muscle can be seen now. It blends perfectly and there is no taste at all. I have been using since January and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J. Ruoff

customer_reviews.title: Tastes really gross
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been using it long enough to notice results. My 2 star review is based on the flavor. I can definitely taste this protein powder so it isn't "flavorless". It has a bitter and musty protein powder taste. I don't like the flavor in my coffee at all so I'm going to try it in some smoothies and other things to see if that'll hide it better. I want to keep using it for the health benefits so here's hoping I can choke it down. I wish they didn't advertise it as having no flavor!
customer_reviews.author: E.A

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS STUFF
customer_reviews.text: This product is MAGIC! I have tried lots of different products for "Hair, Skin and Nails" and haven't noticed a difference at all, until I tried this product. Within a week I could see a dramatic difference in my skin. I put a scoop in my coffee every morning, it has no taste or smell. I LOVE THIS STUFF
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

product_meta.title: Vital Proteins Collagen Peptides Powder - Pasture Raised, Grass Fed, unflavored 20 oz
feature_bullets: Bioavailable Collagen Peptides Powder ---- Sourced from grass-fed, pasture-raised bovine to ensure a high quality and sustainable source of this powerful ingredient. Digested and absorbed by the body quickly for maximum benefits.

Health Benefits ---- Original Collagen Peptides with Hyaluronic Acid + Vitamin C is Vital Proteins exclusive product. Helps improve the health of your hair, skin, nails, joints and ligaments, and tendons**.
Easy to Use ---- Soluble in hot or cold liquids, including coffee, smoothies, and tea. 1-2 scoops a day is all you need! It can be taken in the morning, afternoon or in the evening.
Certifications ---- Paleo Friendly & Whole30 Approved. No added sugars or sweeteners. Gluten / cholesterol / heavy metals / dairy free. Flavorless, odorless.

20g Collagen Powder per Serving ---- We provide a scoop to measure it, which two scoops of powder = 20g. That's also why the container isn’t full and just has to leave room for the scoop. And our product quantity is based on weight, not canister size.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
